data.title: Top-Rated Boys Independent School In Chester County, PA
data.meta_description: Malvern Prep of Chester County is an independent, Augustinian school for young men in grades six through twelve. Discover more here today!
data.text: Malvern Prep is the direct continuation of the academy program founded in 1842 by the Augustinians as the preparatory school for what is now Villanova University.
